medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening pruritus described as generalized itching for one month, severe enough to damage her skin.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reports worsening pruritus for one month. She also experienced a fall onto cement recently, resulting in bruising and soreness but denies other acute symptoms such as fever or gastrointestinal bleeding. There is reported abdominal tenderness, particularly in the right upper quadrant.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous liver transplant, chronic HCV, history of alcohol abuse, knee surgery, depression (with a suicide attempt one and a half years ago), history of seizures.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of liver disease or hepatitis.
medical_history.social_history: Previous tobacco use; specifics on current habits not provided.
